title: I have 4 email addresses. All of them run through one of the addresses outgoing server settings. This one I can both send and receive. The other 3 I can receive but not send.
content: I have 4 email addresses. All of them run through one of the addresses outgoing server settings. This one I can both send and receive. The other 3 I can receive but not send. I get this message "Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <lindasilver@nyc.rr.com> sender rejected. The email address you are sending as must match the email address you used to auth. Please check your SMTP settings. AUP#Out-1500. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again." NOTHING HAS CHANGED! This occurred after I was blocked by Optonline.net for sending out an email that was too large a file. I tried to reach them but could not. Do not know if this had anything to do with this. A coincidence?? i tried setting up a new email address but get the same message.... Any thoughts? Thanks for any help. p.s. I have been using Thunderbird since Outlook Express. Great email program. Too bad no individual support. I always wondered as I would pay a monthly fee....
creator: artieg

title: problem deleting messages in inbox
content:
I have 3 email accounts in Thunderbird, all POP3 type via Spectrum.

I’ve been having intermittent problems with one of the accounts, namely that I can't delete some messages in the Inbox. (The Inboxes for the other 2 accounts seem to be fine.) When I try to do so I get a "Thunderbird is not responding" message and everything freezes. I have to use Task Manager to exit the program.

I went to Help >Troubleshooting and cleared the cache, disabled add-ons, etc., but no luck so far.

I would really appreciate any suggestions. If the only remedy is to uninstall and re-install TB, how do I do that?

Thanks!
creator: Bartholo

title: Thunderbird will not open
content:
Thunderbird will not accept my reset passwords and there is no method to reset the passwords. I have tried 5 times, no help.

Cancel my subscription if I can't get help.

title: Mail is sent twice every time
content: I have a new computer with Windows 11 and new installed Thunderbird. In the old computer every email was sent once. But now every email is sent twice. Why? Can I change that?
creator: hakan_lofgren

title: Thunderbird impossibile accedere ad un account di posta
content: Utilizzo da sempre Thunderbird con 3 diversi account di posta, 2 di gmail ed 1 di alice.it, su un account esistente di gmail e che ha sempre funzionato ora mi dice che non riesce ad autenticarsi al server, ho provato a eliminare l'account e rifarlo, niente, ho provato con un punto di ripristino precedente, niente, ho provato a disinstallare e reinstallare Thunderbird, niente, non so più cosa fare, l'account di posta è gmail e in google riesco ad entrare pertanto la password e il nome utente sono corretti, ho la vaga impressione che siano rimasti in memoria alcuni dati errati, dopo la reinstallazione del programma mi chiede di inserire la password ma cliccando non si apre nulla, se qualcuno riesce ad aiutarmi per favore....
creator: nikocau

title: Can anyone suggest an addon for better spam control?
content:
Hi there everyone,

Let me just start by saying that I have always found Thunderbird's spam capability to be abysmal. Years down the road, TB continues to get obvious and easy to rate emails wrong generating both false positives and negatives. No matter how many times I mark as spam or not-spam, years later, TB still throws a ton of my reply notifications in the junk folder and serves me nigerian scams on a platter in my inbox. The feature is so bad, it's actually a time saver for me to turn it off.

Is there an addon that replaces TB's spam system that works better or do I just need to run with no app spam control?

Thanks for your time!
creator: Schwim

title: thunderbird master password does not work
content: I am using master password but it doesn't work. because it asks for password on first boot. only the password window appears. If I press Cancel, the program closes, then when I open the program again, this time the main window of the program opens in the back window and the defined mail accounts appear. The small password window appears again, but if I press Cancel, I can open mails in mail accounts. The little password screen comes up again and again, but every time I press Cancel, I can use Thunderbird and open emails. Therefore, defining a "Master Password" is meaningless. I think there is an opening. When the master password is entered incorrectly or the program you click Cancel, the program should shut itself down completely and should not show/display the defined mail accounts. My e-mail account is ferhatgurgen@msn.com, I can also send related images.
creator: ferhatgurgen

title: Change font color of folder pane and thread pane
content:
I have read everything and tried everything but I am not able to change the font color of the folder pane and thread pane in TB 102.10.1.

I put in the userChome.css for example the following (and tried many more) . The font and everything else changes. But not the font color.

  • { 
   color: rgb(203, 49, 49) !important;    }

/* Global UI font */

  • { font-size: 11pt !important; 
   font-family: Verdana !important;     color: rgb(203, 49, 49) !important;  }  
 /* Menu font */

menu, menulist, menuitem { 

   font-family: Times New Roman !important;     color: rgb(203, 49, 49) !important;  }

toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets is set to true.

How can I change the font color of the folder pane and thread pane?
creator: WalterA

title: Thunderbird text pixelated
content:
Good day. I am having a problem with Thunderbird 102.10.1 where all text is pixelated. I can't think of another way to describe it. This is a problem throughout all aspects of Thunderbird. All panels, toolbars, tabs, Settings, Account Settings, More Troubleshooting Information, Calendar, anything in the Thunderbird window.

This problem persists when I disable all (or any one) extension.

If I do a screen capture (Win-Shift-S) and paste the image into a graphics program the text is 'normal'. The problem is not there.

This problem goes away when I enter Troubleshoot mode.

Any help appreciated.
creator: dchapman1
